scripts.dev:all: start cmd /k "cd backend && npm run dev" && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build
